about_the_game:
Your village has struck gold, but riches attract danger.

The creatures of the forest have caught wind of your fortune, and their greed knows no bounds. Now, it's up to you to protect what's yours or be overrun by the relentless hordes.

KEY FEATURES


  • CHOOSE YOUR CLASS

    Each class comes with its own strengths and weaknesses, offering a unique approach to defending your village.

  • CREATE A MAZE

    Place towers and buildings wherever you like to shape the battlefield and guide enemies into your defenses.

  • STRATEGIZE

    It's not just about defending—managing your economy is key. Balance mining for gold, upgrading technology, and building defenses to survive the onslaught.

  • SHOOT THEM YOURSELF

    Take matters into your own hands! Jump into any tower and personally take aim at the incoming enemies.

name: Greed Forest Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 (64-bit) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 550 Ti / AMD Radeon HD 7750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 / AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 / AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Strategic 3D tower defense where you shape the battlefield and economy. Freely place towers to create evolving mazes. Invest in technology and economy to strengthen your defenses against escalating threats. Inspired by classic RTS games, this TD combines strategic depth with dynamic tower placement.
